Cost.description: The price that is used to calculat what the cost price is of products that are sold to the party who sells it.

EcoTax.description: Economic taxes (recycling fees) can be used for display purposes, not used in any logic.

PotentialDiscountedPrice.description: Can be used to give an indication of effective product prices after applying discounts. This is purely for display purposes.

Promotion.description: A promotional price reduction of the normal Sales price.

Purchase.description: The price that is used for sales prices between organizations in a B2B scenario.

RecommendedRetail.description: RecommendedRetail prices can be used for display purposes, not used in any logic.

Sales.description: The price that is used as the price that a product is sold for in the normal B2C scenarios.
